navigationBar.description: Versatile navigation bars adaptable to any site layout. Supports dropdowns, responsive toggling, and branding options.
navigationBar.useCases: Main website navigation, user dashboards, mobile-friendly menus.

modals.description: Customizable pop-up modals for user alerts, data forms, or detailed content displays.
modals.useCases: Contact forms, information pop-ups, image galleries.

cards.description: Flexible cards for displaying a variety of content types, including images, text, and links.
cards.useCases: Product listings, blog posts, profile cards.

gridSystem.description: Responsive grid system for structuring content in a clean, organized layout.
gridSystem.useCases: Photo galleries, product grids, layout structuring.

offCanvas.description: Side navigation or content panels that slide in and out of the page.
offCanvas.useCases: Mobile menus, shopping carts, chat panels.

accordion.description: Collapsible content panels for presenting information in a limited space.
accordion.useCases: FAQ sections, product descriptions, collapsible lists.

spinners.useCases: Page load, data submission, waiting screens.

tooltips.description: Small pop-up boxes that provide additional information when hovering over an element.
tooltips.useCases: Help text, form instructions, additional details.
tooltips.example: <button type='button' class='btn btn-secondary' data-bs-toggle='tooltip' data-bs-placement='top' title='Tooltip on top'>Tooltip on top</button>

toasts.description: Small, non-disruptive messages that appear at the edge of the interface.
toasts.useCases: Success messages, error alerts, brief notifications.

footers.description: Tailored footers for website end sections.
footers.useCases: Website endings, additional navigation, contact details.

tabs.useCases: Product details, user profile settings, categorized information.

getShitDoneKit.description: Comprehensive UI kit with a modern design.

bootflat.description: Flat UI kit ideal for startup websites and apps.

PicoCSS.useCases: Personal blogs, small business websites, minimalistic portfolios.

Bootstrap.description: Comprehensive front-end framework for responsive projects.

Materialize.description: Combines Material Design's interaction design philosophy with responsive web design.
Materialize.useCases: User interfaces with rich features, admin panels.

Bulma.useCases: Tech startups, creative agencies, modern portfolios.

TailwindCSS.description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.
TailwindCSS.useCases: Custom user interfaces, design-heavy projects, single-page applications.

Foundation.useCases: Enterprise-level websites, responsive web applications, complex e-commerce sites.

SemanticUI.description: Creates a language for sharing UI, perfect for readable and maintainable code.
SemanticUI.useCases: Community-driven websites, forums, social media platforms.

Skeleton.useCases: Landing pages, simple portfolios, introductory websites.

Animate.css.description: A cross-browser library of CSS animations.

AOS.description: Animate On Scroll library for animating elements as you scroll.

Pure.css.description: A set of small, responsive CSS modules.
Pure.css.useCases: Small projects, responsive grids, minimalist designs.

Milligram.description: A minimalist CSS framework for faster web design.
